title.narrative: 101/004 By 2020, the quality of integrated service delivery and effective coverage have been strengthened in national and subnational education systems to support the well-being of children under 5 years and their mothers, in emergency and non-emergency situations, including urban..

description.narrative: Strengthened institutional capacity of the government ministries responsible for ECD resulted in solid progress for ECD in 2019. An ECD coordination structure was established, pre-primary education (PPE) was standardized, and a commitment to implementing two-year PPE was made. More than 26,000 teachers were recruited by DPE, government ownership increased for 4,000 Para Centres, and early learning services were ensured for 214 ,467 children, including Rohingya refugees. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
